item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：南非将在特朗普会晤前与马斯克达成 "星链 "协议
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引三位熟悉相关讨论的人士的话报道，南非政府计划为埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的星链（Starlink）互联网服务在该国的运营提供一个当地黑人所有权法律的变通办法。【原文：South Africa's government plans to offer a workaround of local Black ownership laws for Elon Musk's Starlink internet service to operate in the country, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing three people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 卡塔尔投资管理局（QIA）计划在未来十年将美国年投资额至少翻一番
item.description: 卡塔尔主权财富基金（QIA）首席执行官周二表示，该基金计划在未来十年内将美国的年投资额至少翻一番，此前该基金已承诺在未来十年内向美国经济投资 5000 亿美元。【原文：Qatar's sovereign wealth fund (QIA) is planning to at least double its annual U.S. investments in the next decade, its CEO said on Tuesday, after the fund has already pledged to invest $500 billion in the U.S. economy over the next 10 years.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长埃斯克里瓦认为美国贸易政策对全球金融业构成风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）决策者何塞-路易斯-埃斯克里瓦（Jose Luis Escriva）周二警告说，美国关税引发的地缘政治和贸易紧张局势对全球金融体系的稳定和全球经济增长构成了风险。【原文：Geopolitical and trade tensions stemming from U.S. tariffs pose a risk to the stability of the global financial system and to global economic growth, European Central Bank policymaker Jose Luis Escriva warned on Tuesday.】

item.title: 与美国和欧盟达成协议，英国开始高风险平衡行动
item.description: 英国对贸易协议的追求使其成为驾驭特朗普新世界秩序的试验品。【原文：Britain's pursuit of trade deals has made it a test case for navigating Trump's new world order.】

item.title: WeRide 加入腾讯云，打造面向海外市场的智能驾驶服务
item.description: 中国自动驾驶初创公司 WeRide 周二表示，将与腾讯云合作，推动机器人出租车的大规模商业运营，并为海外市场打造智能驾驶解决方案。【原文：Chinese self-driving startup WeRide said on Tuesday that it will partner with Tencent Cloud to promote large-scale robotaxi commercial operations and build smart driving solutions for overseas markets.】

item.title: 早间竞标尴尬的七国集团
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 据《澳大利亚金融时报》报道，西太平洋银行将裁员 1,500 人，简化业务流程
item.description: 据《澳大利亚金融评论报》周二报道，西太平洋银行（Westpac Banking Corp）正计划裁员1500多人，以实现成本削减目标，并根据一项名为 "团结"（Unite）的计划简化业务。【原文：Westpac Banking Corp is planning to cut more than 1,500 jobs to meet cost reduction targets and simplify operations under a plan known as Unite, the Australian Financial Review reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会民主党人要求法官裁定特朗普非法解雇他们
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会（Federal Trade Commission）的两名民主党人于今年 3 月被唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统解雇，他们将于周二敦促华盛顿的一名联邦法官宣布此举非法，这是有关总统权力限制的最新一次摊牌。【原文：Two Democrats on the U.S. Federal Trade Commission who were fired by President Donald Trump in March will urge a federal judge in Washington to declare the move illegal on Tuesday, in the latest showdown over the limits of presidential power.】

item.title: 需求稳定，家得宝销售额超预期，维持预期
item.description: 本周二，家得宝第一季度销售额超出华尔街预期，原因是这家全球最大的家装零售商享受到了专业承包商和现有房主小规模维修工程的强劲需求。【原文：Home Depot beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter sales on Tuesday as the world's largest home improvement retailer enjoyed resilient demand from professional contractors and small-scale repair works by existing homeowners.】

item.title: 印尼打车司机举行抗议活动，要求提高薪酬
item.description: 周二，数百名出租车和外卖司机在印尼多个城市参加抗议活动，抗议低工资和反对印尼最大的科技公司GoTo与在美国上市的打车服务竞争对手Grab的合并计划。【原文：Hundreds of taxi and delivery drivers joined protests in several cities across Indonesia on Tuesday over low wages and to oppose a planned merger between the country's largest tech company GoTo and U.S.-listed ride-hailing rival Grab .】

item.title: 美国众议院共和党人期待特朗普弥补党派在税收法案上的分歧
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普预计将于周二前往国会山与国会共和党人会面，他们的目标是就一项全面的减税法案达成一致，而共和党人以微弱多数在减支范围上存在分歧。【原文：President Donald Trump is expected to head to Capitol Hill on Tuesday to meet with congressional Republicans as they aim to reach agreement on a sweeping tax-cut bill, with their narrow majority divided over the scope of spending cuts.】

item.title: 减肥公司努姆转向小剂量复方威戈维
item.description: 随着美国药品监管机构对大批量生产诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk）的Wegovy这种抢手药品的行为进行查禁，在线减肥公司Noom开始提供剂量较小的复方制剂。【原文：Online weight-loss company Noom has begun offering smaller doses of compounded versions of Novo Nordisk's Wegovy as the U.S. drugs regulator clamps down on mass production of copies of the in-demand medicine.】

item.title: 独家报道雷-库兹韦尔（Ray Kurzweil）的仿人机器人初创公司正在洽谈 1 亿美元投资事宜
item.description: 著名人工智能未来学家雷-库兹韦尔（Ray Kurzweil）联合创办的仿人机器人初创公司周二表示，风险投资公司 Gauntlet Ventures 将支持其 1 亿美元的 B 轮融资。【原文：A humanoid robotics startup co-founded by prominent artificial-intelligence futurist Ray Kurzweil said on Tuesday that venture capital firm Gauntlet Ventures will back its $100 million Series B funding round.】

item.title: 美联储官员发表评论前，美股期货走低
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货小幅走低，投资者全天等待美联储官员的评论，以判断央行在美国信用评级最新下调后的政策立场。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were marginally lower on Tuesday as investors awaited commentary from Federal Reserve officials through the day to gauge the central bank's policy stance after the latest downgrade of the United States' credit rating.】

item.title: 全球零售商的关税战略有可能将痛苦蔓延到美国消费者之外
item.description: 包括凉鞋制造商 Birkenstock 和珠宝商 Pandora 在内的全球零售商正在考虑通过提高各市场的价格来分摊美国关税的成本，以避免在美国大幅涨价而损害销售。【原文：Global retailers including sandal maker Birkenstock and jeweller Pandora are looking at spreading the cost of U.S. tariffs by raising prices across markets to avoid big hikes in the United States that could hurt sales.】

item.title: 电池制造商克莱奥斯公司在美国为价值 10 亿美元的关键矿物工厂选址
item.description: 全球投资公司布鲁克菲尔德（Brookfield）旗下的电池制造商克莱奥斯公司（Clarios）周二表示，该公司正在美国为一座价值高达 10 亿美元的关键矿物加工和回收厂选址，三个州的厂址都在竞争之列。【原文：Clarios, a battery maker owned by global investment firm Brookfield, is scouting locations for an up to $1 billion critical minerals processing and recovery plant in the U.S. and sites in three states are in contention, it said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 报告称，人工智能对女性工作的威胁大于男性
item.description: 联合国国际劳工组织周二发布的一份报告显示，传统上由女性从事的工作比男性从事的工作更容易受到人工智能的影响，尤其是在高收入国家。【原文：Jobs traditionally done by women are more vulnerable to the impact of artificial intelligence than those done by men, especially in high-income countries, a report by the United Nations' International Labour Organization showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 康菲石油公司首席执行官称，如果油价维持在当前区间，美国页岩油将趋于稳定
item.description: 康菲石油公司（ConocoPhillips）首席执行官瑞安-兰斯（Ryan Lance）周二表示，如果油价保持目前的水平，美国页岩油产量将趋于平稳，如果油价达到每桶50美元左右，产量将开始下降。【原文：U.S. shale oil production will flatten out if prices remain where they are now and will start to decline with oil prices in the $50s per barrel, ConocoPhillips CEO Ryan Lance said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 对日本超长期债券收益率创历史新高的反应
item.description: 周二，日本最长期限国债收益率攀升至历史新高，此前，由于对该国财政健康状况的担忧加剧，一场糟糕的拍卖引发了债券市场的抛售。【原文：Japan's longest-dated government bond yields climbed to all-time highs on Tuesday, after a poor auction sparked a selloff in the bond market as worries about the country's fiscal health grow.】

item.title: 研究显示，美国关税抑制了全球出口商的情绪
item.description: 安联贸易周二公布的一项全球调查显示，美国新关税浪潮严重打击了出口商的情绪，42%的公司目前预计其出口收入将明显下降。【原文：The wave of new U.S. tariffs has severely dampened the mood among exporters and 42% of companies now expect their export revenues to decline markedly, according to a global survey by Allianz Trade published on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称英特尔正在探索出售网络和边缘部门
item.description: 三位熟知内情的消息人士透露，英特尔已经考虑剥离网络和边缘业务，因为这家芯片制造商希望砍掉其新任首席执行官认为并不重要的部分。【原文：Intel has considered divesting its network and edge businesses as the chipmaker looks to shave off parts of the company its new chief executive does not see as crucial, three sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 普华永道调查显示，大多数美国高管希望至少撤换一名董事
item.description: 普华永道（PwC）和美国经济咨商局（The Conference Board）的最新研究显示，绝大多数美国高管希望至少更换一名公司董事会成员，而且越来越多的高管认为董事们正在干预管理层。【原文：The vast majority of senior U.S. executives want at least one member of their company's board to be replaced, and a fast-growing number feel that directors are muscling in on management, new research from PwC and The Conference Board shows.】

item.title: 市场担忧需求，日本超长期债券收益率飙升至创纪录水平
item.description: 周二，日本最长期限国债收益率飙升至历史新高，原因是 20 年期国债拍卖情况不佳，投资者对国债需求的担忧加剧。【原文：The longest-dated Japanese government bond yields soared to all-time highs on Tuesday, as investors' worries about demand for the debts flared following a poor auction of 20-year securities.】

item.title: 超长期债券收益率飙升，敦促日本央行加大债券购买力度
item.description: 日本央行周二表示，在超长期债券收益率急剧上升之后，一些市场参与者敦促日本央行增加超长期债券的购买量，或终止对该期限债券的缩减。【原文：Some market players urged the Bank of Japan to increase buying of super-long bonds, or terminate tapering for that maturity, in the wake of sharp rises in their yields, the central bank said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 印度医疗保健人工智能初创公司 Qure.AI 首席执行官表示，目标是在两年内上市
item.description: Qure.AI 是一家为医疗保健公司提供人工智能工具的印度初创公司，其首席执行官告诉路透社，该公司的目标是在下一财年实现盈利，并在两年内首次公开募股（IPO）。【原文：Qure.AI, an India-based startup providing artificial intelligence tools to healthcare firms, is aiming to turn profitable in the next financial year and for an initial public offer (IPO) in two years, its CEO told Reuters.】

item.title: 交易日 应对美国评级下调
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 沃达丰称德国今年将恢复增长
item.description: 移动和宽带供应商沃达丰（Vodafone）周二表示，截至 3 月底的全年业绩达到预期，预计今年在其最大市场德国的业绩将恢复增长，从而推动现金流的增加。【原文：Mobile and broadband provider Vodafone said it expected to return to top-line growth in Germany, its largest market, this year, driving an increase in cash flow after it said it met expectations for the year to end-March on Tuesday.】

item.title: 研究称，2024 年对拉美初创企业的投资增长 26%，2025 年将再次增长
item.description: 本周二发表的一份研究报告显示，2024 年拉丁美洲初创企业筹集的资金比 2023 年增长了 26%，超过了增长 7% 的欧洲和缩水 34% 的东南亚。【原文：Capital raised for startups in Latin America grew 26% in 2024 from 2023, more than in Europe, which was up 7%, and Southeast Asia, which shrank 34%, according to a study published on Tuesday.】

item.title: 苹果供应商富士康将向印度分公司投资 15 亿美元
item.description: 苹果供应商富士康在提交的一份文件中表示，该公司将向其印度分公司投资 15 亿卢比，因为这家 iPhone 制造商正在将更多的生产转移出受关税影响的中国。【原文：Apple supplier Foxconn will invest 1.5 billion rupees in its India unit, the company said in a filing, as the iPhone maker shifts more manufacturing out of tariff-hit China.】

item.title: Starlink 在孟加拉国启动，促进可靠的互联网接入
item.description: 科技企业家埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）旗下 SpaceX 公司的卫星互联网服务 Starlink 周二在孟加拉国发射升空，这个南亚国家正加紧努力确保可靠、不间断的互联网接入。【原文：Tech entrepreneur Elon Musk’s SpaceX-owned satellite internet service Starlink launched in Bangladesh on Tuesday, as the South Asian nation steps up efforts to ensure reliable, uninterrupted access to the internet.】
